item.title: LSE Agro Production LTD
item.description:
About Us

LSE Agro Production LTD specializes in the wholesale of fresh vegetables and the production of high-quality hot pepper sauce. With a commitment to freshness and flavor, we provide premium products that cater to both local and international markets.

Our Services

  • Fresh Vegetables: Wholesale supply of quality produce
  • Hot Pepper Sauce: Premium hot sauce production

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Salim Mohammed
  • Phone: 379-7779
  • Email: lseagroproductionltd@gmail.com
